alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Country Club, or near Miami Gardens, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Miami Gardens, Weston, North Miami, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Medley, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North, Sunshine Acres, Country Club, Pennsuco and Miramar Parkway And University Drive. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
